project_name.justification: The primary project of interest is explicitly named throughout the documents, for example: 'Getchell Gold Corp. Announces Raising Sufficient Funds to Make the Final Earn-In Option Payment to Acquire 100% of the Fondaway Canyon Gold Project, NV'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified at the beginning of the press release: 'Getchell Gold Corp.(CSE: GTCH) (OTCQB: GGLDF) (FWB: GGA1)("Getchell" or the "Company")'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer, Getchell Gold Corp., is quoted in the text: '"Completing the acquisition of the Fondaway Canyon gold project will undoubtably be a milestone event..." Bill Wagener, Chairman and CEO, commented.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The company acquired a full 100% interest in the properties: '...the Company has delivered the final US$1.6 million earn-in option cash payment and US$1 million share issuance to acquire a 100% interest in the Fondaway Canyon and Dixie Comstock gold properties...'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is explicitly referred to as a gold project: '...to acquire a 100% interest in the Fondaway Canyon and Dixie Comstock gold properties...'

verified_article_link.justification: No specific article link was provided in the source documents, only a general company website (www.getchellgold.com).

currency.justification: The currency for the transaction payments is specified as US dollars: '...paying Canagold a total of US$2 million in cash and US$2 million in the Company's shares...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The project's share is $1,000,000, calculated as half of the total US$2 million cash payment shared between the Fondaway Canyon and Dixie Comstock properties, as stated in the agreement terms: '...the Company has the option to acquire 100% of the Fondaway Canyon and Dixie Comstock, properties by paying Canagold a total of US$2 million in cash...'

share_payments_raw.justification: The project's share is $1,000,000, calculated as half of the total US$2 million share payment shared between the Fondaway Canyon and Dixie Comstock properties, as stated in the agreement terms: '...the Company has the option to acquire 100% of the Fondaway Canyon and Dixie Comstock, properties by paying Canagold a total of US$2 million in cash and US$2 million in the Company's shares...'

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Explicit cash and share payment values were available, so this combined field is not used.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The total number of shares for the entire US$2 million share component was not specified. The text only mentions the number of shares for the final payment tranche ('issued 10,167,000 shares'), not the total for the full transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: Warrants were mentioned in the context of separate financing activities ('Debenture Warrant', 'Unit Warrant'), not as part of the consideration for the property acquisition.

option_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is an option agreement, but the consideration is specified as cash and shares, not a separate option payment.

issued_share_price.justification: The price per share for the transaction was not mentioned in the deal terms.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment specified in meters was mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The project's share is $725,000, calculated as half of the total US$1.45 million work commitment shared between the Fondaway Canyon and Dixie Comstock properties, as stated in the text: 'The Company also has work commitments totaling US$1.45 million over the four years which have been fully satisfied.'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: As part of the transaction, the seller (Canagold) retained a 2% NSR on the property: '...and grant a 2.0% net smelter return royalty ("NSR Royalty") on each of the Properties to the Option or on the exercise of the Option.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: No coverage area in hectares, square kilometers, or other units was mentioned in the text.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No coverage area unit was mentioned in the text.

resource_size.value: 38.3 million tonnes at an average grade of 1.23 g/t Au for 1,509,100 ounces of gold (Inferred); and 11.0 million tonnes at an average grade of 1.56 g/t Au for an additional 550,800 ounces of gold (Indicated)
resource_size.justification: The text provides a detailed Mineral Resource Estimate for the project: 'Inferred Mineral Resource of 38.3 million tonnes at an average grade of 1.23 g/t Au for 1,509,100 ounces of gold; Indicated Mineral Resource of 11.0 million tonnes at an average grade of 1.56 g/t Au for an additional 550,800 ounces of gold'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are explicitly stated in the text: 'Getchell Gold Corp.(CSE: GTCH)'.
